summary: This bill, the "Helping Small Businesses To Hedge Risk and Insure against Volatile Expenses Act," or the "Helping Small Businesses THRIVE Act," aims to establish a pilot program within the Small Business Administration to assist eligible small businesses in managing the risks associated with price fluctuations of commodities. The program will allow eligible entities to purchase commodity futures to hedge against rising input costs. The bill defines key terms, outlines eligibility criteria, details application procedures, and mandates reports to Congress regarding the program's operations and impact.
